message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've already been very generous with my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $135. This is my best offer within my budget.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $142. This is my final offer within my comfort zone.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $138. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value of the product.

I'm glad we're still in the game, Bob! I can see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to meet you at $140 again, but this time it's non-negotiable. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $137. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $139. This is my last offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal.

Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $138. I hope this is acceptable.
